sentences.en: An equation or inequality relating the variables in an optimization problem.
sentences.cn: 问题中,一种表示若干变量相互关系的方程(式)或不等式.

sentences.en: I laid before him the inequality of the match.
sentences.cn: 我对他说出这种婚姻是多么不平等.

sentences.en: IN MODERN economies, inequality is a fact of life.
sentences.cn: 在现代经济体中, 不平等乃是人之常理.

sentences.en: Inequality and poverty breed class conflict.
sentences.cn: 不平等和贫困滋长阶级对抗.

sentences.en: Inequality is another front on which the bank is ill - equipped to fight.
sentences.cn: 不平等是世行战备不力的另一条阵线.

sentences.en: Inequality used to mean, in most people's minds, poverty.
sentences.cn: 在多数人看来, 不平等通常意味着贫困.

sentences.en: Or does it bring about new forms of inequality and exploitation?
sentences.cn: 它会带来一种新的不平等和剥削方式 吗 ?

sentences.en: People are concerned about corruption and social inequality.
sentences.cn: 人们对腐败和社会不公感到担忧。

sentences.en: Recessions, particularly severe ones, have a way of lowering income inequality.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退, 尤其是严重的经济衰退, 具有减轻收入不公程度的效果.

sentences.en: She became conscious of an inequality.
sentences.cn: 她拥有一种相形见绌的感觉.

sentences.en: Since the above inequality is not satisfied a serial - carry synchronous counter can not be used.
sentences.cn: 因上述不等式不能成立,所以不能采用串行进位同步计数器.

sentences.en: The argument about " conceding " numerical inequality was due either to a misunderstanding or to demagoguery.
sentences.cn: 所谓我们 “ 承认 ” 了数量的不平等,这不是出于误解就是想蛊惑人心.

sentences.en: The mathematical model belongs to linear function with inequality constraints.
sentences.cn: 其数学模型常为带有不等式约束的线性函数.

sentences.en: The regional inequality in income of rural residents was especially prominent.
sentences.cn: 农村居民收入的区域不平等问题表现得尤为突出.

sentences.en: There can be no inequality in love. Give and take must balance.
sentences.cn: 爱情是平等的,双方应该互相迁就.

sentences.en: We derive now a useful variant of that inequality.
sentences.cn: 我们现在推导这个不等式的另一种有用形式.

phrases.tran_cn: 一次不等式；线性不等式
三角形公理；三角不等式

trans.tran_cn: 不平等，不均等，[数]不等式，变动，变化，不相同
trans.tran_en: an unfair situation, in which some groups in society have more money, opportunities, power etc than others
